discourse_list.title: PoC for Recurring Payments on Ethereum

content.content: twitter.com   Jonathan Becker @BeckerrJon    ⚙️ Ethereum-Recurring-Payments 1.0.0  A PoC for Recurring Payments on Ethereum using ERC20's approve and transferFrom methods.  Repository: https://t.co/rSVOrzkMoZ Research: https://t.co/hSRIQhO1GO  #ethereum #eth #ethdev #web3 #solidity #erc1337   11:00 AM - 27 Oct 2021           1
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proof of concept for recurring payments on Ethereum using ERC20's approve and transferFrom methods. The post also includes links to the repository and research. A third party has extended to the proposal by providing entirely positive feedback and advertising it.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
